text: József Kardos (29 March 1960 – 28 July 2022) was a Hungarian footballer. He played as a defender for Újpesti Dózsa and the Hungary national team. Kardos died 28 July 2022, at the age of 62.Szívmegszakadások – Kardos József tragikus sorsáról ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hungarian footballers
title: József Kardos
